title.rendered: Loganair (Scotland’s Airline) Customer care Address | Phone number | Email

content.rendered:
Loganair Limited is a Scottish regional airline founded in 1962, with its registered office on the grounds of Glasgow Airport in Paisley, Renfrewshire.  Its tag line is Scotland’s Airline. It was established on  1962.

 

 

Loganair Address:
Loganair Limited, Cirrus Building, 9 Marchburn Drive, Glasgow Airport, PA3 2SJ

Loganair Customer Care Contact Centre

Phone:
Calls from within the UK: 0344 800 2855

Calls outside the UK: 0044 141 642 9407

*Reservations (including ADS), Extra assistance requests, Queries relating to existing bookings

 Working hours: Monday – Friday 07.00 – 19.00; Saturday 08.00 – 16.00; Sunday 10.00 – 18.00

Loganair Email

Refund enquiry email: bookings@loganair.co.uk

Group travel: https://www.loganair.co.uk/loganair-groups/

Special assistance email: Specialassistance@loganair.co.uk

Loganair Lost baggage | Missed baggage | Damaged baggage

Please contact ground handling staff immediately.

You can use the online form to complain or post to the following address.

Postal address: Customer Relations, Loganair Limited, Cirrus Building, 9 Marchburn Drive, Glasgow Airport, PA3 2SJ

Online form: https://www.loganair.co.uk/contact-3/customer-relations/feedback-form/

*Please include all supporting documentation (receipts, boarding passes etc), and any baggage reference you will have been given when reporting the initial loss or damage.

Phone:
For reservations or customer enquiries: 0344 800 2855

Loganair Official website: https://www.loganair.co.uk/

Loganair Online Check-in: www.Loganair.com/in/gb/online check-in

Note Web Check-in opens 2 hours before departure

Check Loganair schedule here: www.Loganair.com/in/gb/flight schedule

Check Loganair flight status here: www.Loganair.com/in/gb/flight status

Loganair Baggage Allowance

Loganair Baggage

View Loganair Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Types of Planes / Air craft available with Loganair

Total fleet: 29

  • British Aerospace 146-200

British Aerospace BAe ATP

  • British Aerospace BAe ATP

British Aerospace Jetstream 41

  • British Aerospace Jetstream 41

  • Saab 340

Saab 2000

  • Saab 2000

Queries handled by Loganair Customer care:

Flight Ticket Booking, Ticket Cancellation, Flight Ticket Rescheduling, Ok to Board, Visa Services, Online Check-in, Baggage Allowance, Duty Free Allowance, Flight Information, Airport Lounges, Visa Information, In-Flight Meals, Airport Transfers, Missing Luggage, Immigration Services, Valet Parking, Meet and Greet, Flight Wifi, Airport Wifi, In-Flight Entertainment, Airport Facilities, Delayed Flights, Visa on Arrival, First Class, Business Class, Economy Class, Clan Loganair

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Loganair Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.
